page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT:MKT WESTON,B'HAM
page.content: Small businesses & self employment play an important role in the general employment of the area. The services provided include the following: Barningham has agricultural & general engineering,curtain making,architect- ural designer,shoe repair, garage, mill,watch & clock repairs.Market Weston has an architectural designer, painters & decorators,builders, pine stripping of old furniture,mechanical excavator contractor, TV aerials, an educational public relations con- sultant,a cattery,mobile hairdresser and a promoter of Country & Western dances and concerts. In addition to these there is employment in rural crafts & farming (see ARTS AND CRAFTS page 5 and FARMING page 6).
